Package nl.nikhef.jgridstart

Core jGridstart functionality regarding .globus-type certificates.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CertificateCheck Security checks for a certificate directory.
CertificatePair Class containing everything related to a grid certificate.
CertificateRequest Helper class for requesting a new certificate.
CertificateStore Management of multiple .globus-type certificates on disk
CertificateStoreWithDefault A CertificateStore which has the notion of a default certificate.
Organisation Grid organisations to which a user can be associated.
Organisation.RA Registration authorities associated with grid organisations
 

Exception Summary
 

Package nl.nikhef.jgridstart Description

Core jGridstart functionality regarding .globus-type certificates. This is where the actual work regarding certificates happens.

jGridstart works with .globus-type certificate directories and each is represented by a CertificatePair. Together they form a CertificateStore or CertificateStoreWithDefault. At several places, certificate directories are verified to be consistent using CertificateCheck.

CertificateRequest contains some methods to handle new requests. It parses and creates certificate subjects from pieces of information, and knows about password policies. One such piece of information is the organisation a user belongs to. This is handled in the separate class Organisation.
